meanings.definition: Increased five times in quantity or size.
meanings.sent1: The quintupled amount of candy made the children very happy.
meanings.sent2: The quintupled number of balloons filled the room with color.
meanings.sent3: The quintupled servings of ice cream were a delightful surprise at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement quintupled when she saw the beautifully decorated cake.
meanings.sent5: The quintupled stars in the night sky were a breathtaking sight.

meanings.sent1: She ran quintupled faster to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: The car sped quintupled down the highway.
meanings.sent3: His heart raced quintupled as he approached the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The music played quintupled louder as the party went on.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the room quintupled when the surprise guest arrived.
